text: @LewesClub @EnvAgency That would certainly focus minds.

This morning @EnvAgency issued a flood alert for River Itchen Mansbridge and Riverside Park at 0645.  The alert covered the 0606 high tide and 1.5 hours either side of it thus the risk period was 0436 to 0736.  Why issue this alert so late that 3/4 of the timeframe had past?

urls.title: WeatherHub | AHDB
urls.description: The AHDB WeatherHub brings together sources of weather and related data.

text:
Striking difference between the 1-24 October 2020 rainfall totals at two @EnvAgency rain gauges: 
* ~297mm at Kinsford Gate (~465m asl)
* ~124mm at Mole Mills (~100m asl)

Just 11km apart. 

Also, nearby Blackpitts Gate rainfall total now >300mm.
https://t.co/Ei8ddAHWAc https://t.co/JB8D1SWrMg
